mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.name AS "name", a.sex AS "sex", a.card AS "card", a.card_photo AS "cardPhoto", a.work_start AS "workStart", a.university AS "university", a.degree AS "degree", a.ssn AS "ssn", a.protitle_photo AS "protitlePhoto", a.pro_title AS "proTitle", a.voc_qua AS "vocQua", a.work_type AS "workType", a.dept AS "dept"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO org_staff( org_id, name, sex, card, card_photo, work_start, university, degree, ssn, protitle_photo, pro_title, voc_qua, work_type, dept ) VALUES ( #{orgId}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{card}, #{cardPhoto}, #{workStart}, #{university}, #{degree}, #{ssn}, #{protitlePhoto}, #{proTitle}, #{vocQua}, #{workType}, #{dept} )
mapper.update: UPDATE org_staff SET org_id = #{orgId}, name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, card = #{card}, card_photo = #{cardPhoto}, work_start = #{workStart}, university = #{university}, degree = #{degree}, ssn = #{ssn}, protitle_photo = #{protitlePhoto}, pro_title = #{proTitle}, voc_qua = #{vocQua}, work_type = #{workType}, dept = #{dept} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(card) FROM org_staff a WHERE a.card = #{card}
SELECT count(*) FROM org_staff a WHERE a.card = #{card} and a.org_id != #{orgId}
SELECT FROM org_staff a WHERE a.org_id = #{orgId}
SELECT FROM org_staff a WHERE a.org_id = #{map.orgId}
